mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.create_time createTime, u.gender, u.group_id, u.last_login_time lastLoginTime, u.modify_time modifyTime, u.description, u.avatar, d.group_name, GROUP_CONCAT(r.id) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.ROLE_NAME) roleName FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_group d ON (u.group_id = d.id) LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} group by u.username, u.id, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.create_time, u.gender, u.group_id , u.last_login_time, u.modify_time, u.description, u.avatar
